page.title: 11Leisure Activities, Tongue
page.content: A survey of the children's leisure activities showed that by far the biggest number liked playing on their bikes best of all. The next two most popular pastimes were horse riding and fishing with reading and football coming much lower on the list. Adults interviewed gave whist playing as ther favourite pastime with the Wednesday Club (a group for the over 60s) and knitting and reading coming next. Activities which adults,would like to take part in but could not because of lack of facilities, were swimming, evening classes and tennis.
